thread.title: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case
thread.title_full: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case

author: senh
title: Flavor Flav gets February trial date in traffic case
text: BING NEWS: Flavor Flav Gets February Trial Date in Traffic Case The trial for entertainer Flavor Flav has been postponed until Feb. 8 for misdemeanor driving under the influence, speeding and cocaine charges stemming from a vehicle stop last May in Las Vegas. Prosecutors and defense attorney Dayvid Figler said the new ... 10/15/2015 - 8:53 pm | View Link Flavor Flav gets February trial date in Las Vegas traffic case Trial has been postponed to Feb. 8 for entertainer Flavor Flav on misdemeanor driving under the influence, speeding and cocaine charges stemming from a vehicle stop last May in Las Vegas. Prosecutors and defense attorney Dayvid Figler said the new date ... 10/15/2015 - 5:37 pm | View Link Flavor Flav Indicted On Four Driving Charges [Update: Flav Pleads Not Guilty] He initially plead not guilty and was released on bail, but apparently failed to show up to the trial, as he's just been indicted on all four charges. Now, he will have to show up for a January 21st court date ... Flav will be back in court February ... 01/24/2015 - 10:23 am | View Link Flavor Flav Show: Reality Star Pleads Not Guilty To Felony Traffic Charges Over the past April, the rapper pleaded guilty to these charges, which meant he just underwent counseling and went through probation. The next date for the new Flavor Flav show in the New York courthouse is set for February 3. 01/22/2015 - 5:15 am | View Link Flavor Flav grins after pleading not guilty to speeding charges and telling judge he's fixed his SIXTEEN license suspensions Drayton, who lives in Vegas, has pleaded not guilty and is free on bond pending trial on April 28 in Nevada state court on charges of felony assault with a deadly weapon and child endangerment with a weapon.
